reference.title: Terraform Variables
reference.shortdesc: You can configure the following values in your .tfvars file using the included overrides.tfvars.sample file as a guide.

desc.note: Specify the variable values in quotation marks.

row.entry: The unique regional location on which the deployment is launched
The location of your private key file
The location of the router SSL certificate file
The location of the router SSL key file

example.title: A sample .tfvars file
example.codeblock: openstack_availability_zone = "az1" openstack_keypair = "myKeyPair.key" openstack_network_id = "myNetwork" key_file = "/home/myName/Documents/private.key" router_ssl_cert_file = "/etc/ssl/certs/SSL.crt" router_ssl_key_file = "/etc/ssl/private/SSL.key"
